main.description: Record indicating a livestream is published and available for replication at a given address. By convention, the record key is streamer::server

irohTicket.description: Iroh ticket that can be used to access the livestream from the server

server.description: did:web of the server that's currently rebroadcasting the livestream

streamer.description: DID of the streamer whose livestream is being published

updatedAt.description: Periodically updated timestamp when this origin last saw a livestream
